programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: Rainbow Mountain offers tourists a picture-perfect view that has flooded social media feeds; behind this viral beauty spot is the story of a community at war, cries for help ignored and murder.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: In a remote village temple in India, a daring heist saw precious and ancient cultural heritage disappear; two citizen detectives work to bring down one of the biggest art thieves in history.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: Brazil's largest bank robbery; at the heart of the brazen heist is South America's most dangerous gang and its raid on what's is known as the Night of Terror.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: The tale of the strange life and stranger murder of a rare violin collector and his daughter, as told by their friends and two suspects at the heart of the police investigation.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: A "shadow fleet" of aging tankers is keeping Russian oil flowing; Bloomberg set out to uncover the network of intermediaries working to sell the Kremlin's oil while getting rich in the process.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: Brazil's largest bank robbery; at the heart of the brazen heist is South America's most dangerous gang and its raid on what's is known as the Night of Terror.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: IM Academy sold a dream of financial freedom; but behind the luxury lifestyles and Instagram hype, thousands found themselves inside a multi-level marketing maze that left many broke and broken.

programme.desc: Rainbow Mountain offers tourists a picture-perfect view that has flooded social media feeds; behind this viral beauty spot is the story of a community at war, cries for help ignored and murder.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: Fake permits, undercover informants and millions of dollars are involved; a US government agency works to prove suppliers to research labs import wild monkeys from Cambodia with false paperwork.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: An estimated $1 trillion lost globally to fraud; with law enforcement struggling to cope, scambaiter vigilantes are filling the gaps.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: In a remote village temple in India, a daring heist saw precious and ancient cultural heritage disappear; two citizen detectives work to bring down one of the biggest art thieves in history.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: The Green Bible is the single-most important document in the Italian government's war against an alleged Nigerian mafia; but this supposed mafia handbook isn't what it claims to be at all.

programme.title: Bullish With Sonali Basak
programme.desc: There's been a migration of financial powerbrokers to South Florida in recent years, drawn by various factors. It's hard to imagine the capital of finance leaving New York, but Wall Street South is getting bigger every day.

programme.title: Bullish With Sonali Basak
programme.desc: Building wealth used to follow a formula, but these days it's easier than ever to play the markets. With investing tools at everyone's fingertips, is it a chance for generational wealth or a siren call for suckers?

programme.title: Bullish With Sonali Basak
programme.desc: Sonali Basak speaks with two of the most influential investors in American real estate to understand how private capital is reshaping the housing market.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance Radio
programme.desc: The economy and the markets are under surveillance as the latest developments in finance, economics and investment is covered; Tom Keene, Paul Sweeney, Lisa Mateo, Michael Barr and other guests create some intriguing conversation.

programme.title: Bloomberg Intelligence
programme.desc: Bloomberg's Alix Steel and Paul Sweeney harness the power of Bloomberg Intelligence to provide in-depth research and data on more than 2,000 companies and 130 industries.

programme.title: Balance of Power
programme.desc: Focusing on politics and policies on Capitol Hill, in President Trump's administration, the federal agencies and the courts.

programme.title: Bloomberg Businessweek
programme.desc: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec bring together the latest news from the worlds of business and finance and the interesting stories of global technology, politics, economics and more.

programme.title: Sex-for-Work Claims in West Africa's Rubber Industry
programme.sub-title: Sex-for-Work Claims in West Africa's Rubber Industry
programme.desc: A company majority-owned by billionaire Vincent Bolloré's Bolloré Group and Hubert Fabri is the subject of allegations of labor abuses at some of its African rubber plantations, including by female workers who say they were forced to engage in sex.

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry
programme.desc: Artificial intelligence has begun to exhibit early signs of agency.

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry
programme.desc: Bioacoustics technology and AI are revealing how animals communicate, and may soon allow humans to talk to them.

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry
programme.desc: With the promise of unimaginable computing power, a global race for quantum supremacy is raging.

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry
programme.desc: Human survival depends on water, yet global reserves are rapidly shrinking; it's now replaced oil as the most likely cause of global conflict; discussing whether technology can help secure humanity's future water needs.

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry
programme.desc: Pain is a fact of life; for some, it is excruciating and inescapable; but amid the continuing fallout of the opioid crisis, the development of new technologies aims to limit and even eliminate pain.

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry
programme.desc: Soon, another billion people will be online, mostly from developing nations; ways new users will embrace this technology to transform their lives; its meaning for the rest of the world.
